dct_description_sm: Relief shown by hachures.; "Entered according to Act of Congress in the year 1855 by J.H. Colton & Co. in the Clerk's Office of the District Court of the United States for the Southern District of New York."; "No. 101" in lower right margin.; Text on verso: "Cape of Good Hope-Cape Colony."; Coverage includes Madagascar and various Indian Ocean islands.
